about_the_game:
UNLOCK over 75 WWE Superstars and Legends INSTANTLY with the Ultimate Brawlers Pass--an INSANE VALUE!

Jump right into the arcade-style action as Hulk Hogan, “Stone Cold” Steve Austin, Ronda Rousey, Ric Flair, Goldberg, Ultimate Warrior, “Rowdy” Roddy Piper and MANY, MANY MORE (base model attire only).

Only in WWE 2K Battlegrounds can you battle it out with your favorite WWE Superstars and Legends in outlandish environments using an arsenal of over-the-top moves, in your face power-ups and special abilities.

Get your Ultimate Brawlers Pass today for WWE 2K Battlegrounds and BRAWL WITHOUT LIMITS!
detailed_description:
UNLOCK over 75 WWE Superstars and Legends INSTANTLY with the Ultimate Brawlers Pass--an INSANE VALUE!

Jump right into the arcade-style action as Hulk Hogan, “Stone Cold” Steve Austin, Ronda Rousey, Ric Flair, Goldberg, Ultimate Warrior, “Rowdy” Roddy Piper and MANY, MANY MORE (base model attire only).

Only in WWE 2K Battlegrounds can you battle it out with your favorite WWE Superstars and Legends in outlandish environments using an arsenal of over-the-top moves, in your face power-ups and special abilities.

Get your Ultimate Brawlers Pass today for WWE 2K Battlegrounds and BRAWL WITHOUT LIMITS!

subs.option_text: WWE 2K BATTLEGROUNDS - Ultimate Brawlers Pass - $14.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy WWE 2K BATTLEGROUNDS - Ultimate Brawlers Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-540 3.06GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (latest service pack) 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5- 3.50 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670, similar or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible sound card

short_description: UNLOCK over 75 WWE Superstars and Legends INSTANTLY with the Ultimate Brawlers Pass--an INSANE VALUE!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic*, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
